GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.4.225
GSD.description:
bpf, test_run: Fix alignment problem in bpf_prog_test_run_skb()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit 7a704dbfd3735304e261f2787c52fbc7c3884736, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 1cf1cae963c2e6032aebe1637e995bc2f5d330f4. For more details please see the references link.
